mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `task` (`user_id`, `title`, `content`, `status`, `start_time`, `end_time`, `complete_time`, `create_time`, `update_time`) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status}, #{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{completeTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
